page.title: 14Tiddenfoot Leisure Centre
page.content: Tiddenfoot Leisure Centre was opened in 1975. In the Centre there is a large swimming pool, which always has about two staff at the pool side. They have fun swims every Saturday and every day except Sunday in the holidays. On Thursdays in term time there are mother and baby swimming sessions. There is a sauna, spa bath and solarium. The lounge is upstairs, where gymnastics, keep-fit and table tennis are done. Also tennis can be played. There is a weight lifting room and badminton and squash courts. One squash court has a balcony. Roller skating can also be done at the Centre. You can buy goggles, sweat bands, squash balls and other sports equipment there. There are 9 full time staff, who have their own staff room. Outside the Leisure Centre there is a large car park for the users' cars.
